caption.p: Hyperspectral map image of the Au-ASO mix in the presence of the RNA of the SARS-CoV-2 virus (a) EDFM-HSI original image, (b) overlay of the image “map” on the EDFM-HSI image. (c–g) Zoom-in image in the dotted box of the AuNPs cluster showing the localization of (a) Au-ASO 1M (red), (b) Au-ASO 2L (green), (c) Au-ASO 3H (blue), (d) Au-ASO 4M (purple), and (f) overlay of the four Au-ASOs.
